titleStmt.title: Von Johann Christoph Freiherr von Aretin und Joseph Marius Franz von Babo sowie Joseph Scherer an Johann Ernst Wagner. München, 2. November (?) 1803, Mittwoch (?)

sourceDesc.p: The data set is derived from https://github.com/telota/jean_paul_briefe/tree/v.4.0, the XML data of https://www.jeanpaul-edition.de.
